title: Felipe Gonzalez
text:
I am the CTO of Axiacore with 10 years of experience as a Multimedia Engineer in web development. I have worked as a backend developer for various tech companies, including my current position as CTO. I am passionate about technology and eager to share my knowledge.
After studying Multimedia Engineering at university, I worked on the RAIM project and then became a backend developer in marketing agencies. I joined Axiacore in 2016 and became CTO in 2018. I am results-oriented, decisive, and direct. I take risks and have excellent problem-solving skills.
As a team-oriented individual, I believe in taking on new challenges and working collaboratively to overcome them. While I excel in technical tasks, I understand the importance of leveraging the strengths of each team member to achieve success.
